title: Chinese soy sauce chicken
ingredients: ['4 slices crushed ginger, 1cm each', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 bottle (410ml) Lee Kum Kee Chicken Marinade', '410ml water', '1 piece star anise', '1 teaspoon five spice powder', '1.2kg whole chicken, skin off', '100ml Chinese cooking wine']
